code: import{useEffect}from"react";import scrollUn from"../../fonction/work/ScrollUn";import scrollDeux from"../../fonction/work/ScrollDeux";export default function UseAnimScrollWork(){useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',scrollUn);window.addEventListener('scroll',scrollDeux);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',scrollUn);window.removeEventListener('scroll',scrollDeux);};},[]);}
